name: Wiggly Lovers In Outer Space
description:
Play as an alien couple where you escape humanity's clutches. Blast through the humans with your lasers and become stronger as you merge together with your lover.

Controls: Use A and D or Left Arrow and Right Arrow to move your alien lovers side to side in order to avoid meteors. Use the Left Mouse Button to shoot those pesky humans for more points!  Once the power-up bar is full and both lovers are on screen you are able to press the Space Bar in order to merge into one big alien which has a powerful laser beam!
